message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to make a bit more on this deal. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is still a great price for you, considering the product's value. Let's make this happen!
I understand that you're willing to come down, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
